O'Plérou Grebet bụ onye na-ese ihe na mba Ivory Coast, onye na-emepụta ihe osise na onye na-eme ihe osise nke a maara na o mepụtara ihe karịrị eserese emoji narị atọ na ịrị isii na ise n'efu nke na-egosi ọdịbendị West Africa. A kpọrọ aha ya na ndepụta 30 Under 30 nke Forbes Africa.
A mụrụ O'Plérou Luc Denis Grebet na Nọvemba 7, 1997, na Abidjan, Ivory Coast
Ọ na-ese ihe mgbe niile dị ka nwatakịrị. Ọ gara Fine Arts School nke Abidjan maka otu afọ, mgbe ahụ ọ gụrụ ihe osise na mmepe weebụ na Institute of Sciences and Communication Techniques.
N'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2017, OʹPlérou mụtara ime emojis site n'ile ihe nkiri nkuzi na YouTube
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya "Zouzoukwa", na Jenụwarị 1, 2018, nke o bu n'uche imepụta ma bipụta kwa ụbọchị na Instagram emoji ọhụrụ nke metụtara Africa ruo na ngwụcha afọ
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịkekọrịta ọdịbendị Ivory Coast na ụwa site na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta. N'ime izu mbụ nke ịmalite ọrụ a, ọ nwetara ndị na-eso ụzọ ọhụrụ dị mmadụ pụkụ abụọ.
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018, o tinyere emojis narị atọ na ịrị isii na ise niile n'ime ngwa iji mee ka emojis ya jiri dị ka mkpado na WhatsApp na iMessage.

O meriri ihe nrite Young Talent Award na Africa Digital Communication Days (Adicom Days) na Abidjan, Ivory Coast, ebe nzukọ maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dijitalụ na Africa na-asụ French maka ọrụ ya. N'ime usoro ahụ, ya na ụlọ ọrụ French Canal + rụkọtara ọrụ, nke na-eji ụfọdụ n'ime emoticons ya "nke e mere na Ivo" na netwọk mmekọrịta n'oge iko mba ụwa nke bọọlụ na June na July
Ọ rụkọtara ọrụ na ụdị uwe na ngwa ndị Ivorian, Imalk Concept, na emojis ya na akpa akpa.
